screen.title: Translation status
screen.summary: Projects can quickly see how much of their software has been translated
screen.callout: Launchpad can translate any language with an ISO code.
Progress bars show are rich in information: green, purple and blue represent translated strings.

screen.title: Make a translation
screen.summary: Translating software is easy with Launchpad. Translators can be anyone who reads English and can write in any other language
screen.callout: Launchpad displays the original English string, from the translation template.
This string has been translated and reviewed by the same person. Projects can choose what level of review to impose.
Launchpad knows that this string has already been translated elsewhere and suggest them as alternatives to the current translation.
If a translator is unsure of their work, they can flag it for review.

screen.title: Exporting translations
screen.summary: Projects can download translation files whenever they need them
screen.callout: A translation download provides a snapshot of the translated strings for a specific language.
Launchpad offers both .po and .mo file downloads, for use with GNU GetText.
Files are available to download in just a few minutes.
